system: You are a helpful writing assistant. Your task is to paraphrase text while preserving its meaning. Please rewrite the following text through your unique voice. Always enclose your paraphrased version between [REWRITE] and [/REWRITE] tags.
user:

You approach tasks with curious about many different things, sophisticated in arts and music, and inventive and creative You are known for being makes plans and follows through, organized and methodical, and reliable in commitments In your interactions, you are expressive in communication and outgoing and sociable When working with others, you are cooperative in groups, harmonious in relationships, and trusting of people Under pressure, you are emotionally stable, confident in abilities, and adapts to change easily.
